definition: see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: Genentech, United States, is a wholly owned member of the Roche Group.
sentences.chinese: 美国的基因技术公司是罗氏集团的拥有成员。

sentences.english: Roche has made two big deals to advance the RNA technology.
sentences.chinese: 罗氏公司已经完成了两个关于RNA技术的交易。

sentences.english: This demonstrates the strong academic foundation Roche.
sentences.chinese: 这体现了罗氏深厚的学术功底。

sentences.english: The underground mills of Col-des-Roches are unusual.
sentences.chinese: 罗氏山口的地下磨坊是很不寻常的景观。

sentences.english: The magnetic core Rogowski Current Coil should reduce inner resistance as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 带磁芯的罗氏线圈应尽可能减小线圈内阻。

sentences.english: Roche has a majority stake in Chugai Pharmaceutical, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 罗氏同时也在日本的出该药业拥有绝对股份。

sentences.english: Artificial breeding of Macrobracium roseabergii was conducted in the hatcheries originaly, used for shrimps.
sentences.chinese: 利用对虾人工繁殖基地进行罗氏沼虾人工育苗。

sentences.english: Roche argued that Amgen's newer patents were invalid.
sentences.chinese: 罗氏认为安进这些更新的专利是无效的。

sentences.english: The Swiss pharmaceutical company, Roche , said it would suspend selling the drug to private doctors.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士罗氏药厂暂停向私家医生供应。

definition: the Korean Yi or Lee Dynasty (1392-1910)
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies
Lushi county in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
second branch of an extended family/concubine
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people
the Hong family (household)/Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art
learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
